name: banqueting
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the activity of having a large formal meal for many people: The conference speeches were followed by banqueting. The dinner is to be held in the banqueting hall. See
banquet
More examplesFewer examplesWe have a large hall suitable for banqueting.The cost of his entertaining and banqueting at the palace is met by the taxpayer.The hotel has banqueting and conference facilities.
